comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.Deploy the apps with AVD/Emulator(android 2.2) 2.Crtl+F11 to switch the emulator, repeats about 10 times 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Check the logcat, I get the error msg shown as below: 12-24 13:49:09.830: DEBUG/skia(32313): --- decoder->decode returned false 12-24 13:49:09.830: ERROR/org.andnav.osm.views.util.OpenStreetMapRendererBase(32313): OutOfMemoryError loading bitmap: /mnt/sdcard/osmdroid/tiles/Mapnik/13/4094/2725.png.tile 12-24 13:49:10.009: INFO/dalvikvm-heap(32313): Clamp target GC heap from 16.050MB to 16.000MB What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Osmdroid APIs version: osmdroid-android-1.09.jar AVD: Android 2.2 OS: window XP Please provide any additional information below. Even if I checkout the newlest source code and export a jar, I still meet this problem.
Close all the duplicate OOM issues.
